law.catch_line: Termination or refusal to issue insurance due to credit history prohibited.

text.section: For purposes of this section, "personal risks" shall have the meaning as defined in KRS 304.13-011.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 540, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 212, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
